text: Amosov () is a Russian masculine surname, its feminine counterpart is Amosova. It may refer to *Alexey Amosov (born 1981), Russian sledge hockey player *Nikolai Amosov (1913–2002), Ukrainian heart surgeon *Serafima Amosova (1914-1993), Deputy Regimental Commander of the 46th Guards Night Bomber Aviation Regiment *Zinaida Amosova (born 1950), Soviet cross-country skier ==See also== *2948 Amosov, an asteroid named after Nikolai Amosov Category:Russian-language surnames
title: Amosov
